textContent:
I'm not okay. The mental stress is eating me alive bc it's the worst kind: there is nothing I can do about it. Yet I'm asked to keep trying every day. Keep working hard. It will get better. But it's not. I want  to have a life of joy. Joy from my family my friends my community. The amount of suffering going on with my work community is so painful and so unnecessary and so maddening and so helpless that it's sapping the joy from my life. I don't want to wait my whole adult life for things to get better only to realize I never did what brought me joy 

I think I just need to talk about it. I need to tell someone and he heard and head it acknowledged that this sucks but it's going to be okay
textContentHtml:
I'm not okay. The mental stress is eating me alive bc it's the worst kind: there is nothing I can do about it. Yet I'm asked to keep trying every day. Keep working hard. It will get better. But it's not. I want  to have a life of joy. Joy from my family my friends my community. The amount of suffering going on with my work community is so painful and so unnecessary and so maddening and so helpless that it's sapping the joy from my life. I don't want to wait my whole adult life for things to get better only to realize I never did what brought me joy 


I think I just need to talk about it. I need to tell someone and he heard and head it acknowledged that this sucks but it's going to be okay
